Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Ten Pieces, op. 12

1906–1913

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 22' 30"

  • 1. Marche
  • 2. Gavotte
  • 3. Rigaudon
  • 4. Mazurka
  • 5. Caprice
  • 6. Légende
  • 7. Prélude
  • 8. Allemande
  • 9. Scherzo humoristique
  • 10. Scherzo

1. Marche

This march also exists in an earlier version.

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Gavotte

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 4

3. Rigaudon

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3.5

4. Mazurka

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 4

5. Caprice

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

6. Légende

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3

7. Prélude

Prokofiev specified that this piece could be played by piano or by harp.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

8. Allemande

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

9. Scherzo humoristique

Prokofiev later arranged this piece for four bassoons (op. 12bis).

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

10. Scherzo

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5
